slide-1.title: How to Play
content: Baccarat is a game where you guess which hand will win: Player, Banker, or Tie (draw), with the total value closest to 9.

slide-2.title: How to Play
content: Cards are valued by their numbers. Face cards (J, Q, K) count as 0, and Ace counts as 1. If the total exceeds 9, only the last digit is considered (e.g., 15 becomes 5).

slide-3.title: Result
content: The winning hand is the one closest to 9. If Player and Banker totals are equal, the result is a Tie.
